title: The Flame’s Daughter - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Historical   Martial Arts   Romance   Wuxia
tags: Adapted to Drama   Adapted to Manhua   Betrayal   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Misunderstandings   Revenge
author: Ming Xiaoxi   明晓溪
description: Ruge who is as innocent and bubbly as a flame is Lie Huo Manor’s successor. Her longtime past from nineteen years ago will draw her into a maelstrom. Three men are fated to appear in Ruge’s life, the proud and aloof Feng(maple), the soft and gentle Yu(jade) and the peerless and beautiful Xue(snow). Soul-stirring scenes of entangling love and hatred will start to be presented. >
